attributes.action: put more funding into cancer research with a view in finding a cure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My brother in law has just died from cancer leaving a wife and two children and it is about time the government put more funding into cancer research. So many people are dying from this horrible disease that I do not understand why a cure has not been found by now. It is time that as much money is put into finding a cure before anybody else has to die from this disease.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
